name: "Chaged" Super Special Secret Edition
description:
"Chaged" Super Special Secret Edition is a puzzle game starring a Test Subject in the middle of a containment breach who encounters many interesting characters and many more threats on his quest to find a way out of the big and dangerous facility that he's stuck inside of.

This game is a parody of DragonSnow's video game "Changed" and is a relatively short 3 to 5-hour experience, filled to the brim with as much content as I could fit into it.

If you're interested in listening to this game's soundtrack, you can find it here on YouTube
